entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: Albus Dumbledore is sitting next to Harry and staring into the far corner of the room. He ignores Harry completely.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is talking to Albus Dumbledore and trying to understand where he is.

entities.name: basin
entities.description: The basin in Dumbledore's cabinet caught Harry's attention.
